definition: to mirror/to reflect/mirror image/reflection/(fig.) to report/to make known/to render
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to reflect (light)/to shine/to project (an image onto a screen etc)
theory of reflection (in dialectic materialism), i.e. every perception reflects physical reality

sentences.english: Post-impressionism reflected a number of the same attitudes as symbolism in literature.
sentences.chinese: 後印象派反映了大量與文學象徵主義相似的態度。

sentences.english: It also reflects the pantheistic experimentation of the period immediately following the Civil War.
sentences.chinese: 同時也反映出了泛神論時期緊跟的內戰時期狀態。

sentences.english: Xiangyin Jianzi is a local rhyme dictionary of the Changsha dialect in the early 20th Century.
sentences.chinese: 《湘音檢字》是一部反映20世紀初長沙方言的韻書。

sentences.english: This mirrors the situation when we are watching a public figure apologizing.
sentences.chinese: 這反映了我們觀看一個公衆人物道歉時的狀態。

sentences.english: Hanfeizi has reflected Hanfei's political viewpoint in a concentrated way.
sentences.chinese: 《韓非子》集中反映了韓非的政治觀點。

sentences.english: <div class="cfx">The list also reflected breakneck advances in supercomputing speeds.
sentences.chinese: 這份排名還反映了在超級計算速度方面的極快進步。

sentences.english: But do these figures reflect the real income situation of Chinese people?
sentences.chinese: 但這些數據是否反映了中國人民的真實情況呢？

sentences.english: Consumption rate is an important macroeconomic index used to reflect economic condition.
sentences.chinese: 消費率是反映國民經濟運行狀況的重要宏觀經濟指標。

sentences.english: Those under inspection shall report the situation faithfully and provide necessary data.
sentences.chinese: 被檢查者應當如實反映情況，提供必要的資料。

sentences.english: These projects showed the wisdom and innovativeness of the participating students.
sentences.chinese: 這些資助項目反映出大學生們的智慧和創造力。

sentences.english: Leukocyte telomere length (LTL) reflects not only chronologic age but also the burden of disease. We hypothesized that LTL would be decreased in children with OSA.
sentences.chinese: 白細胞端粒長度不僅反映年齡變化而且反映疾病負擔。

sentences.english: Leukocyte telomere length (LTL) reflects not only chronologic age but also the burden of disease. We hypothesized that LTL would be decreased in children with OSA.
sentences.chinese: 白細胞端粒長度不僅反映年齡變化而且反映疾病負擔。

sentences.english: When SSH jokes, he will turn hellos head and look for KTHsreaction.
sentences.chinese: 宋承憲講嘲笑話的時候回頭不雅察泰熙反映。

sentences.english: By way of analogy, we may say the results of a sports competition reflect the rules of the game.
sentences.chinese: 以體育競賽爲譬，可說是比賽結果反映遊戲規則。

sentences.english: This is a reflection of Hemingways stubborn pessimism.
sentences.chinese: 這是海明威式的固執的悲觀主義情結的反映。

sentences.english: This book inflects chinese society in the 30s.
sentences.chinese: 這本書反映了30年代的中國社會。

definition: to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
to appear/to emerge/to present (a certain appearance)/to demonstrate
to make clear/to make known/to state clearly/to indicate/known
